publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-49 Kenneth Gibson: Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections—That the Parliament believes that Scotland would be better served by having Scottish Parliament and local authority elections on separate dates.
S3M-49 Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections (lodged on 22 May 2007) Bob Doris*

S3M-49 Kenneth Gibson: Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections—That the Parliament believes that Scotland would be better served by having Scottish Parliament and local authority elections on separate dates. Supported by: Bob Doris
S3M-49 Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections (lodged on 22 May 2007) Bashir Ahmad*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Patrick Harvie*

S3M-49 Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections (lodged on 22 May 2007) Christine Grahame*, John Lamont*, Keith Brown*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Brian Adam*, Derek Brownlee*, Joe FitzPatrick*, David McLetchie*
S3M-49 Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections (lodged on 22 May 2007) Alasdair Allan*
S3M-49 Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections (lodged on 22 May 2007) Elizabeth Smith*, Nanette Milne*, Charlie Gordon*, Mike Pringle*
S3M-49 Date of Scottish Parliament and Local Authority Elections (lodged on 22 May 2007) Ian McKee*
